item.title: [Python] What do you do for visualization of 4 variables or more?
item.description: # Purpose of this article What if you want to check the relationship of many variables at once in data analysis? I think pairplot is the typical one, but it’s more! I thought I could summarize it, but recently I learned something like Sankey Diagram, so I drew it. Added: Please read the additional part at the end of the article first. How to use # Plotly Sankey Diagram
